alert.note: Alert for Coastal Palm Beach County; Inland Palm Beach County; Metro Palm Beach County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 15 at 3:25PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Palm Beach County through 400 PM EDT... At 325 PM EDT, trained weather spotters reported a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a funnel cloud near Delray Beach. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Funnel clouds and winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Funnel clouds occasionally touch down and produce tornadoes or waterspouts. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Boca Raton, Boynton Beach, Delray Beach, Highland Beach, Ocean Ridge, Village Of Golf, Kings Point, Dunes Road, Whisper Walk, Hamptons At Boca Raton, Hypoluxo, Gulf Stream, Briny Breezes, Manalapan, Morikami Park, Villages Of Oriole and Boca Raton Equestrian. FUNNEL CLOUD...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Funnel clouds occasionally touch down and produce tornadoes or waterspouts. Move indoors and stay away from windows. Persons participating in outdoor activities should seek sturdy shelter until this storm passes. Open shelters found in parks, beaches, or golf courses offer no protection from the dangers of lightning.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Palm Beach County; Inland Palm Beach County; Metro Palm Beach County
